text: 🗣️Let's talk energy prices in light of the Ukraine War. 💥 It's time we shed light on the real agenda behind this conflict. 😡 The mainstream media wants you to believe it's all about saving democracy, but in reality, it's about control and power. 💪 Our country needs to prioritize our own energy independence and stop relying on foreign countries with their hidden agendas. 🛢️ Let's stand up for our nation, protect our economy, and ensure our energy prices remain affordable for every hardworking American. 🇺🇸✊
